Renaming Project Databases

You can rename a project database to change the name displayed for all users when they open the database.

NOTE Only users with the SuperUser privilege can rename project databases.

To rename a project database:

  1. Select the project database you want to rename in the Project pane.

  2. Select File | Rename. The Rename dialog box appears.

  3. Enter a new project database name in the Name field.

  4. Click OK.
